titleStmt.title: A piece of the world, painted in proper colours. Presented to the illusterous [sic] Majesty of our most gracious Queene Mary. / By Francis Lenton gent. Her Majesties poet..
titleStmt.author: Lenton, Francis, fl. 1630-1640.
Raworth, John, d. 1645, printer.

notesStmt.note: Signatures: [A]-G¹² H³; extra leaf at beginning.
Dedication to Francis Lenton from John Coyse - p. [7]-[9].
Imperfect: cropped, torn, tightly bound, and stained.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
